scripts.build:i18n: for file in `find . -name "*.po"` ; do msgfmt -o ${file/.po/.mo} $file ; done
scripts.build:archive: rm ./dist.zip; zip -r9 ./dist.zip *.php assets/images/* languages/*.mo template-parts/* vendor/* style.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:i18n && npm run build:archive
